scripts.pretest: rm -rf build && mkdir build && json2module package.json > build/package.js && rollup -f umd -n fmin -o build/fmin.js -- index.js && rollup -f umd -n fmin_vis -o build/fmin_vis.js -- index_vis.js
scripts.prepublish: npm run test && uglifyjs build/fmin.js -c -m -o build/fmin.min.js
scripts.postpublish: zip -j build/fmin.zip -- LICENSE README.md build/fmin.js build/fmin.min.js
